All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

Wholly, entirely, in every way, by all means, certainly. Adverb from pas; entirely; specially, at all events, in no event.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
